text: i want to express my thanks to <@U04C479603U> and <@U01QVR44MEY> who have helped me out during our onboarding since becoming a HubSpot customer.  <@U04C479603U> went above and beyond as our onboarding specialist and <@U01QVR44MEY> has helped me with coding problems and debugging. Thanks to both of you for all the help! <#CQ8KX8WRZ|gratitude>
Thanks to <@U01QVR44MEY> for answering my stupid questions - you're a real one :raised_hands:
There's no stupid questions, everyones learning.
